page.title: 19SCHOOL YEAR FOR 4TH YRS POEM
page.content: A school year starts again Autumn comes to us with rain. Football starts,rounders finish As the days diminish. We played five_aside football At Chailey Secondary School. It was fun _ we won! Then came the Area Cross Country Run. Christmas is here,the play is near. Introducing"Sherlock Gnome & the Missing Toys" Acted by all the girls and boys. Christmas is done;we're back at school A different football tournament starts Plus netball too. We won again,we can't seem to loose. Near the end of term,some are nervous, As the annual tests we take. But for some_its just a piece of cake. Easter is over,Summers on its way. Here comes the Swimming Gala And the Area Sports Day.
